channel.title: Level up = freeze?
channel.description:
I'm using pk planet as my source and changed it. I tried the server and I noticed that when I level up thieving the game freezes. I don't know if other skills freeze too, but I would like to fix it, but I don't know how. I can't find anything in the searchbar. Any suggestions?
I've downloaded the source again and changed nothing but it still doesnt work.

item.title: Level up = freeze?
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

it doesn’t really crashes or shuts down. The clients just freezes. My source says nothing, only if I click on the X button in the right top of the screen it says: player … disconnected or something liek that, but that’s normal.

Read full topic

item.title: Level up = freeze?
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

I have only changed the exp rates and rewards…
well here are my codes:

Public void:

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); } }

Stalls:

if(objectID == 4878){ TheifStall("stall", "and recieve some coins.", 99, 250*playerLevel[17], 995, 200000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2561){ TheifStall("cake stall", "and recieve some coins.", 40, 500*playerLevel[17], 995, 37500, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve some coins.", 80, 1250*playerLevel[17], 995, 125000, 0x340); setAnimation(881); } if(objectID == 4876){ TheifStall("General Stall", "And Recieve Some Coins!", 20, 400*playerLevel[17], 995, 22500, 0x340); setAnimation(881); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve some coins.", 1, 250*playerLevel[17], 995, 12500, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve some coins.", 50, 800*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("fish stall", "and recieve some coins.", 60, 900*playerLevel[17], 995, 75000, 0x340); }

And here’s my thieving level up code

case 17: // '\021' changeText126("@dre@Congratulations! You've just advanced a Thieving level!", 4263); changeText126((new StringBuilder()).append("You have now reached level ").append(getLevelForXP(playerXP[i])). append("!").toString(), 4264); sendFrame164(4261); if (playerLevel[17] == 99) { itemMessage("Congratulations, Your Thieving level is now 99!", "Speak to Bob at Home for a skill cape of achievement.", 2710, 250); maxedStats += 1; } break;

Read full topic
